sentences.en: An operator wearing earphone was sitting in the telephone exchange.

sentences.en: By e-mail and earphone, he confers with Jack Parrish, chief meteorologist, and they order the NOAA technician to slip a dropsonde into the shoot.
sentences.cn: 通过电子邮件和耳机，他与首席气象学家杰克·帕里什联络，指挥NOAA的技术人员发射下投式探空仪。

sentences.en: Can you help me with this earphone? I can't hear anything.
sentences.cn: ●你能帮我看看这个耳机 吗 ?我什么也听不见.

sentences.en: Denise: I asked what's that earphone you're wearing.
sentences.cn: 丹尼斯: 我问你戴的那个是什麽耳机.

sentences.en: He jacked in the earphone so that he would not disturb others.
sentences.cn: 为了不打扰别人,他插上了耳塞.

sentences.en: I don't need an earphone . I just watch the picture.

sentences.en: In addition, the original earphone of Philips also have quite good performance.

sentences.en: The language of kabuki is difficult to understand, but earphones are provided to explain the story, and there are also earphone services available in English.

sentences.en: The reason for this is that the useful earphone control button / mic requires special jack.
sentences.cn: 这么设计的原因是耳机的控制按钮（同时也是麦克风）需要特殊插孔。

sentences.en: We are Chinese professional manufacturer for many kinds of headset, earphone, headphone.

sentences.en: Which channel do I set the earphone to see the movie?
sentences.cn: 我应该将耳机放入几号频道,才能看电影?

sentences.en: You could use a hands - free device or an earphone.
sentences.cn: 可以使用免提设备或者耳机.

trans.tran_en: a small piece of equipment connected by a wire to a radio, personal stereo etc, which you put in or over your ears so that only you can listen to it
